title: How do you run from tryndamere?
body: can someone tell me how do you escape from tryndy, without cc or watever, because normally his slow cuts me down fast, i stun him thn flash over wall but thn he 360 SPINS over it and slows me again thn continues to destroy me ( btw im in wood 5 ) but halp  me pls!

Anyway those are voyboys top counterpicks to him - sometimes you can't do much about him though but exhaust is generally great seeing as he has to E in and deal damage quickly to be useful and exhausting him can shut down his DPS a lot and then he usually has to over-commit to do his job or even hurt people - couple this with a bit of CC seeing as his damage was halfed by the exhaust and your support can exhaust him again and he can get shut down hard.

TPs pretty safe too but I prefer exhaust unless I can out-range him a lot - Ignites sorta bad because it's basically useless post 6 and all you're doing is hoping he cant smash you with ulti (I mean not many people can sit and fight him for the full duration and then chase him down after ults down and the heal isn't that significant plus during laning phase - it's a consistent heal in most cases so ignite doesn't do much against it and shutting his damage down by 40% and slowing him works pretty well.

Burst him down. Tryndamere excels in extended fights, burst him to 1 hp (mind you, you'll have to be doing much more damage than him, because once he pops ult that's a 5 second window of freedom for him), run back, count 4 seconds, turn back and around hit him a few times and he should die
